column6:
All adventure, all action, for all ages! Join Mr. Fantastic, the Invisible Woman, the Human Torch and the Thing for a wild ride of all-new, unforgettable exploits. When the world-renowned heroes happen upon some children in distress, they naturally rush to the rescue! But not everything is as it seems, and the Fantastic Four are in for much more than they bargained for. ,2005,6
32 PGS./ ALL AGES ...$2.50
column7: | Fantastic Four | Human Torch | Invisible Woman | Mr. Fantastic | Thing
column8: | penciller:Carlo Pagualyan | penciller (cover):Michael Ryan | letterer:Dave Sharpe | writer:Akira Yoshida
